agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Business & Industry TIME & DATE: 11:00 AM or upon final adjourn. / recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, February 19, 2019 PLACE: E2.016 CHAIR: Rep. Trey Martinez Fischer The committee will meet for an organizational hearing to hear invited testimony only. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
